data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Serguei V. Triapitsyn (2017): Revision of Alaptus (Hymenoptera: Mymaridae) in the Holarctic region, with taxonomic notes on some extralimital species. Zootaxa 4279 (1): 1-92, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4279.1.1|94 occurrences
